name: Lollipop & Marshmallow Match3
description:
Play Lollipop & Marshmallow Match3 the most delectable match-3 game in a candy wonderland!
If you have a BIG sweet tooth, you’ve hit the sweet spot with the classic gameplay in a rainbow mania of mixed candy drops and lollipops!

Join Jenny on her scrumptious journey to win back the lollipops stolen from the sneaky Marshmallow brothers! Sweeten up the challenge as you crush assorted colorful candies through various quests in beautiful delicious environments, like Lollipop Wood and Fudge Desert.

One of the best casual games for unlimited fun!

HOW TO PLAY
• Swap and match 3 or more candies.
• Remove as many candies in as few moves as possible.
• Create amazing combinations like striped and rainbow candies!
• Earn 3 stars to get more coins.

FEATURES
• Simple and fun match-3 puzzle gameplay
• Hundreds of unique levels with regular updates.
• Various tasty missions, like catch the Marshmallow Brothers, collect various treats and drop sweets to the bottom and much more!
• Create colorful candy combos and use awesome power-ups, like Magic Wand and Honey Stick, to help you with stickier levels.
• Candies can come from all different directions, not just down!
• No time limit so play at your own pace.
• No WiFi required. Enjoy online and offline!

NOTES
• Lollipop & Marshmallow Match3 contains ads like banner, interstitial, video and house ads.
• Lollipop & Marshmallow Match3 is free to play, but you can purchase in-app items like AD FREE and coins.

SUPPORT UNIVERSAL APP
• Enjoy the game on various devices (phones and tablets).

E-MAIL
• help@bitmango.com

HOMEPAGE
• https://play.google.com/store/apps/dev?id=6249013288401661340

Like us on FACEBOOK
• https://www.facebook.com/BitMangoGames

App Permissions

[Required Permissions]
- None

[Optional Permissions]
- Photo / Media / File: required storage access permission to save game data

[Permission setting and withdrawal method]
- Android 6.0+: Device Settings> Application Management> Select App> Revoke Access
- Under Android 6.0: Can revoke access by deleting application

Have fun crushing lollipops!
